articles.description: After their win over PBKS, KKR shared a heart-warming video on social media in which Nitish Rana could be seen hugging his mother.

articles.description: 'The Economic Times' has reported on the athletes' FIR, in which they allegedly expressed 'utter shock' that the oversight panel had tried to 'justify the actions of the accused,' Brij Bhushan Sharan Singh.
articles.content: New Delhi: As wrestlers protest at Delhi’s Jantar Mantar for attention to serious allegations of sexual harassment against Wrestling Federation of India chief and BJP MP, Brij Bhushan Singh, complain… [+2314 chars]

articles.author: Tim MacMahon
articles.title: Kevin Durant gets tech for shoving Nikola Jokic in sideline confrontation - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Kevin Durant was called for a technical foul after shoving Nikola Jokic out of the way when the Nuggets superstar attempted to infiltrate an impromptu Suns huddle during Game 5 of the Western Conference semifinal series.
articles.content:
DENVER -- Nuggets superstar Nikola Jokic was involved in another feisty sideline confrontation Tuesday night, but this time he was on the receiving end of a shove, from Suns superstar Kevin Durant.

articles.title: "WTA needs to seek clarification on the matter and punish the tournament" - Tennis fans react to Jessica Pegula's statements on Madrid Open ceremony - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Tennis fans slammed the Madrid Open after Jessica Pegula spoke about the controversy surrounding the women's doubles final.
articles.content:
Tennis fans slammed the Madrid Open after Jessica Pegula spoke about the controversy surrounding the women's doubles final.
